src:
Ostajajo prvi in neporaženi
06 Nov 2019, 21:15 by Aleš Sorta

Koprčani še naprej uspešno krmarijo na dveh frontah. V domačem državnem prvenstvu so se nocoj morali pošteno potruditi za zmago, kar pa ob zgoščenem tekmovalnem koledarju ni tako presenetljivo.



Koprčani še naprej uspešno krmarijo na dveh frontah.  Foto: Žiga Mikeli/Koper Primorska

KOPER > Prvaki vendarle ohranjajo neporaženost po petih odigranih tekmah, čeprav koprska obramba ni bila tako čvrsta, kot smo je vajeni.
Koper Primorska : Šenčur 86:85ŠD Bonifika, gledalcev 700 sodniki Mlakar (Škofja Loka), Pipan (Ljubljana), Mohorič (Velenje); četrtine - 25:21, 18:21, 19:16, 24:27. Koper Primorska: Holt 11 (4:4), Čakarun 9 (5:3), Hrovat, Barič, Kosi, Lazić 8 (2:0), Marinković 19 (4:1), Hodžić, Jagodić Kuridža 14 (7:4), Dimec 4, Šiško 16, Vončina 5 (1:1). Trener: Jurica Golemac.
Zlasti v zadnji četrtini je Šenčur pridno polnil koš gostiteljev, ki so se v končnici tekme vendarle izvlekli. Gostje so imeli v zadnji minuti celo priložnost za zmago, a so si privoščili preveč napak v napadu, pri čemer so jim popustili tudi živci. Koprčani pa so ohranili minimalno prednost. Do prve zmage v evropskem pokalu pa je prišel tudi naslednji tekmec Koprčanov, Cedevita Olimpija.
text:
They remain first and undefeated
06 Nov 2019, 21:15 by Aleš Sorta

The Spearmen continue to successfully navigate the two fronts. In the national championship tonight, they had to make a real effort to win, which is not so surprising given the tight competition calendar.



The Spearmen continue to successfully navigate the two fronts. Photo: Žiga Mikeli / Koper Primorska

KOPER> The champions still remain undefeated after five games played, even though the Koper defense was not as solid as we were used to.
Koper Primorska: Sencur 86: 85 Bonifika SD, spectators 700 judges Mlakar (Skofja Loka), Pipan (Ljubljana), Mohoric (Velenje); quarters - 25:21, 18:21, 19:16, 24:27. Koper Primorska: Holt 11 (4: 4), Chakarun 9 (5: 3), Hrovat, Baric, Kosi, Lazic 8 (2: 0), Marinkovic 19 (4: 1), Hodzic, Jagodic Kuridza 14 (7: 4) ), Dimec 4, Sisko 16, Vonchina 5 (1: 1). Coach: Jurica Golemac.
Especially in the last quarter, Sencur filled the basket of the hosts, who nevertheless pulled out in the playoffs. The guests even had a chance to win at the last minute, but they afforded too much offense in the attack, with their nerves loosened as well. However, the Koprivnica retained a minimal advantage. The first victory in the European Cup was also won by the next Koprcana competitor, Cedevita Olimpija.
